languages.name: Fisherman
lines: It’s been a long time since we’ve seen a new face around here.
Want a map to the nearest island? I wouldn’t go there if I were you.
Odd currents on the way, and a bunch of strange lads, mining some black rock like mads.
And it’s no better anywhere else on that sea.
All you’ll find is either plain water and no wind, or hazardous currents and treatrous reefs.
And I don’t talk about the “people”...
Anyway, it’s not much to help, but here you go.
